page.title: 08Games at school/2
page.content: {GAME OF BRITISH BULLDOG. You have two wolves standing in the middle of the playground waiting for you.One of the wolves shouts who they want for their tea.They call out the name of who they will catch.That child runs out to see if he or she can get to the other side.The wolves try to tag that child.If they succeed that child is on it with the wolves.If the named child gets to the other side he or she can walk back,without the wolves being able to get that child. If that child is tagged he or she is on it with the wolves.The wolves all shout another child's name,however this time the named child has to be picked up instead of being tagged.
